entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:20 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 06:30 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -4.9°C
Pressure: 100.7 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to light snow near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low zero.
